name: Sky Twit
description:
"Sky Twit" is a challenging game in which you have a rocket and you have to drive without facing any obstacles and collect more coins.

# Game Features:
* Use accelerometer to tilt your rocket.
* Collect coins as many as possible.
* Avoid obstacles as much as you can.
* Collect more coins and buy powers which are easier to collect coins in game using those powers.
* The power price is depending on your collected coins.
* There is different price value for different powers.
* You can share score through Game center and challenge your Friends.
